result.title: How to write Beautiful Code
result.content: Hi Codeforces. I think most of you give me down vote but please comment something too : ) actually i'm about newbie(probably as an expert rated one here) i have lots of problems in how should i code to be NEAT and BEAUTIFUL i'll be so happy if you help in comments to code so. i don't know what should i say more. so ask in comments if something is missed thank you all : ) good luck.
